DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether experienced endoscopy nurse participation screen colonoscopy could increase polyp adenoma detection rate .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Experienced Endoscopy Nurse Participation Polyp Adenoma Detection During Colonoscopy
